group_1.textRight: Thank you, Urara, for accommodating@my sudden request today.

group_1.textLeft: I wanna lend a hand however I can, considering@you guys helped me out, y'know.

group_1.textRight: We sincerely apologize for inconveniencing@you as well, Kurara-dono.
Weâ€™re sorry about the suddenness of it all.

group_1.textLeft: ...I used to think Magical Girls were just an@urban legend.
But seeing the three of you in action at the@Festival made me unable to believe otherwise.
Even so, we can't take responsibility for whatever@might happen after today's broadcast.
I know... To be honest, I was surprised by what@you said...
If you'd garnered more sympathy for Magical Girls,@wouldn't more people come to your defense?
But this directs anger towards you guys and only@spares other Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: That's correct, Urara. However, if we attempted to@elicit sympathy under the current circumstances,
it would have struck a nerve with the Eradication@group and caused even more harm.
Right now, our main priority is to appease@the Eradicators
by letting them vent their frustrations on us@without restraint.

group_1.textLeft: I heard the broadcast just now...!

group_1.textRight: If what you said is true, then you're the only ones@we have to settle the score with...?!
You two, hurry back to the studio as soon@as possible.

group_1.textLeft: If we kick these guys out, maybe our friends in@the hospital will be satisfied.

group_1.textRight: Let's join up with that Kuroda dude and crush@these guys.

group_1.textLeft: The fire was ignited as planned.

group_1.textRight: From now on, it's time to endure.

group_1.narration: "So please, I hope you'll leave the uninvolved@Magical Girls out of this."
"We'll atone for our own sins, so please spare@the other Magical Girls from your ire."

group_1.textCenter: Certainly, what you are doing could save the@other Magical Girls.
Nevertheless, I fear you've strayed from@your original goal...
If you admit responsibility for disasters and@suffering in this town,
people will perceive Magical Girls as dangerous@and consequently shun you...
You, who sought salvation the most,@will never attain it...
(Since I began my research,@Yukuni City is the first town I've been to where
the existence of Magical Girls has been@recognized by ordinary people.)
...I have to use this as a stepping stone.
